cms.emailtemplate.EmailTemplatePlainText:

This submission was created with priority {% GetTranslationPriority(Submission.SubmissionPriority) |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)9bf5e97e5be3707a46e8b34f751dde8f6ca18f8e6c4d127adf701148c818c3e5%} and is due by {% Submission.SubmissionDeadline |(identity)GlobalAdministrator|(hash)11c9281e51f1ebecb14e71d621d640de529e6eb818b2c5a1d2be92d154267029%}.
